channel.title: Zombie Sci
channel.description:
Hay guys I am new to this forum I just downloaded black mesa today and I loved it and I to say it's aswome and I can't really believe how you guy's did it.
I will thanks to those people who created it.
The reason why I am here I want to know how do you import Zombie Sci model into 3ds max I haven't tried it yet because I am still looking for 3ds max to download I still know how to use that program but I need to find out how and where to get that model.
But if you know where to get the model please explain.
Thank you.
